blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: To My Dearest Tony
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Mr1Awe

by Emmagan

Some time set after Endgame (SPOILERS), Pepper has to remain strong for her family, her job and the people around her. With the overwhelming grief she finds a way to grieve in private by writing a letter to Tony.

Words: 302, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Pepper Potts, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark

blog.name: tectum-tegmentum
blog.title: they should put the warnings before the spell
blog.description: phi - psychology major - 19

summary:
Stephen: The human body is 70% water. So we are basically just cucumbers with anxiety
Tony: Excuse me, with the amount of...
body:
Stephen: The human body is 70% water. So we are basically just cucumbers with anxiety

Tony: Excuse me, with the amount of alcohol and salt that I consume, I’m more like an anxiety pickle

blog.name: tony-strq
blog.title: carol is a funky lil supernova space lesbian
blog.description: •  (well shes bi- but yeah) • side blog • mcu stuff • mostly for rants and stuff so i dont flood my other blog with a bunch of bs • but im also here for captain marvel and irondad content •

summary:
all my friends: "yeah I resigned myself to the fact that tony was going to die, so i was sad, but it's okay."
me, even though i...
body:
all my friends: "yeah I resigned myself to the fact that tony was going to die, so i was sad, but it's okay."
me, even though i got spoiled the day i saw endgame: *cried like a baby, is still in mourning, refuses to accept the death of a fictional character*

dialogue.name: all my friends
dialogue.label: all my friends:
dialogue.phrase: "yeah I resigned myself to the fact that tony was going to die, so i was sad, but it's okay."

dialogue.name: me, even though i got spoiled the day i saw endgame
dialogue.label: me, even though i got spoiled the day i saw endgame:

title: Biderman
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2wCqq1q

by marvels_blue_phoenix

Sometimes all you need is 20 seconds of insane courage. Just literally 20 seconds of embarrassing bravery, and I promise you, something great will come of it.

Peter decides its time to come out to his family one by one. All he needs is 20 seconds of insane courage to do it.

Words: 2372, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Harley Keener, Peter Parker, Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Pepper Potts & Harley Keener & Peter Parker & Morgan Stark
  • Additional Tags: Ironfamily, Coming Out, Bisexual Peter Parker, supportive family, Brotherly Love, Hugs, Acceptance, Pride, Siblings, biological children

blog.name: fanficfaeriesabolibrary
blog.title: FanficFaerie's A/B/O Library
blog.description:
Alpha/Beta/Omega- a trope wherein some or all people have defined biological roles based on a hierarchical system.
Wing AU - Characters have wings

summary: the slightest touch (and I feel weak) - SailorChibi - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
title: the slightest touch (and I feel weak) - SailorChibi - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
This was so good!! 

Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov, Bucky Barnes, Clint Barton, Phil Coulson, Jarvis (Iron Man movies)
Additional Tags: Wings, Alternate Universe - Wings, wing fic, Wing Grooming, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Misunderstandings, Natasha knows all, bucky barnes is over this shit, Oblivious Tony, Puppy Piles, Avengers Family, Cuddling, so many feels, all the feels, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has Self-Esteem Issues, Sleepy Tony, Manhandling, First Kiss, First cuddles, Cute overload, Fluff, so much fluff seriously
Summary:

“When you’re really tired or out of it, you show the underside of your wings to Steve,” Natasha says to Tony, ignoring Clint, who is doing an excellent impression of a fish. “We’ve all noticed it, but no one ever said anything because we didn’t think you knew. And judging from the look on your face, you didn’t.”

“I don’t –”

Natasha cuts him off with a raised hand. “Save it. I’m sure JARVIS has got video proof. You do it with Steve, Clint does it with Coulson, and both of them melt all over themselves when you two do it.” She stands, picking up her glass of wine. “So please, for the sanity of everyone else who has to live in this house, get over yourselves and just mate already.” She sweeps out of the room.

reblog.comment:
This was so good!!

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description:
Father, trophy husband, retired Avenger. Ask away.

summary: I was a complete panicky mess. Pepper handled this very well by constantly reminding me I was stressing her out. Somehow we got...

summary: Dark!Stephen is a fun Stephen. BUT consider an Other!Stephen who’s trying to have Tony all by himself since there is no...
body: Dark!Stephen is a fun Stephen. BUT consider an Other!Stephen who’s trying to have Tony all by himself since there is no Other!Tony and the real Stephen is helplessly watching everything inside a snowglobe. I watched Coraline and the concept is way too fun. Especially if you see the other mother’s true form. And then I kinda wanna see that explored.

summary: No one can tell me that Harley Keener arrived at the lake house, completely alone and with no personal relationship to anyone...
body:
No one can tell me that Harley Keener arrived at the lake house, completely alone and with no personal relationship to anyone else who was there, and Pepper “mother of the Starks since over 15 years” didn’t immediately pulled him into a warm-hearted embrace

It happened and you can fight me on this
